original_text: For there fell down many slain, because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.
korean_text: 죽임을 당한 자가 많았으니 이 싸움이 하나님께로 말미암았음이라 그들이 그들의 땅에 거주하여 사로잡힐 때까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: For there fell down many slain
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 많은 살해당한 자들이 쓰러졌기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: because the war was of God
And they dwelt in their steads
